Check out my 2016 Showreel!

August 27, 2016 — 15:03

Check out my 2016 showreel to see some of the things I’ve been working on lately!

Duane McPherson 2016 Showreel from Duane McPherson on Vimeo.


Please note that the Malcolm, Max, Bodymech, Flour Sack, Pendulum and Ball rigs are not by me; they have their own amazingly talented creators!

The amazing music you heard was “Read all about it” by the incredibly talented artist “The Passion HiFi”.
Check them out at thepassionhifi.com!!!
